Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Voltage fluctuation in primary bus system. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Design limitation in component load capacity under extreme conditions
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Lighting System component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: M - Other Reasons
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
Date: 16/04/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon
